channel.title: Special Attack PLEASE READ I NEED HELP
channel.description:
i was adding special attacks and i get this error i did everything right but i just got 2 errors now its gone weird
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v371/AirborneViper/problem.jpg[/img]

item.title: Special Attack PLEASE READ I NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“shadeskm, post:5, topic:150842”]ROFL Yeah right -.-[/quote]He probably did. All you have to do is read the debug errors, and find the problem by looking at what they outputted for you. If you dont understand an error, Google it.

Your error means you put the if statement in a place it’s not allowed to be, try moving it to a place it is allowed to be in. Also check if usingSpecial has arguments, that might be why the identifier error is being thrown at you. By arguments check if it has (String blabla) or (int blabla) after where it’s declared.

Read full topic
item.source: Special Attack PLEASE READ I NEED HELP
